src: [start] ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? [MASK] LC : What time is it , please ? [MASK] ARI : I 'm sorry , I do n't know the answer . [MASK] LC : Yeah , well it 's not much . [MASK] RP : Is there a reception for people who have an appointment like me ? [MASK] ARI : Yes , of course . The reception is just behind me . Remember to take a ticket on your right . [MASK] RP : Thank you . [MASK] LC : Can we have a coffee ? [MASK] ARI : You 're welcome . [MASK] LC : Can we have a coffee while we wait ? [MASK] ARI : Yes . There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . [MASK] RP : Do you know the price of a coffee ? [MASK] [end] ARI : No . Sorry , I do n't have this information . # disaffirm ( ) ; cant-help ( ) LC : Is the coffee from a vending machine or a cafeteria ? ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you . # cant-help ( ) LC : Go ahead . ARI : Can I help you ? # offer-help ( ) RP : I can ask ... # incomplete-da ( ) RP : Is the cafeteria open at this time ? It 's 6 PM , is the cafeteria still open ? # request ( cafe ( opening_times ( ) ) ARI : No . The cafeteria is open from 11 AM to 3 PM . # disaffirm ( ) ; inform ( cafe ( opening_times ) )

src: ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? # greet ( ) ; inform ( ari ( name ) ) ; offer-help ( ) [start] RC : Well , shall we go and eat ? [MASK] LP : I think ... [MASK] LP : It 's my first time here and I 'm a bit lost , I 'd like to find ... I think I need to go to the toilet before starting because afterwards I have an appointment with the doctor . Could you tell me ... I must use informal register . Could you , could you tell me how to find the toilets , please ? [MASK] ARI : Very easy ! You have to go to the corridor at the end of the room . [MASK] ARI : Can I help you ? [MASK] ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . Can I help you ? [MASK] RC : So we 'd like to go and eat , is there a cafeteria here ? [MASK] ARI : Yes of course . There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . [MASK] RC : And how do we get there ? [MASK] ARI : I 'm sorry , but I ca n't help you . [MASK] RC : Ok. [MASK] RC : Before we go to the cafeteria , I 'd like to go to the toilet . Where are the toilets ? [MASK] ARI : Very easy ! You have to go to the corridor at the end of the room . [MASK] RC : So what do we do , shall we go ? src: ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? # greet ( ) ; inform ( ari ( name ) ) ; offer-help ( ) LP : Hello I I 'd really like I 'm hungry I 'd really like to eat . And is the room air-conditioned ? The restaurant ? # request ( food ) ; request ( cafe ( air_conditioning ) ) ARI : Yes . Of course . # affirm ( ) ARI : Lunch will be offered at midday if you have afternoon appointments . A snack may be offered after your appointment with the nurse . # inform ( food ) LP : So , Mrs companion , do you know what I 'll be eating today ? # request ( food ( menu ) ) RC : Oh but no , I do n't know , I 'm going to ask . # disaffirm ( ) [start] RC : Can you tell us if there is a cafeteria ? We 've been very well received here , and I have no directions . I 'm looking for a cafeteria to have a coffee or a hot chocolate . [MASK] ARI : There are a few options available as part of your visit , and there 's also a cafeteria on the ground floor . [MASK] RC : Can you tell me where on the ground floor ? Right , left , straight ahead ? [MASK] ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . [MASK] RC : Okay , thank you . [MASK] RC : Um also ... [MASK] LP : Um what time can we have lunch ? [MASK] RC : Can you tell me the cafeteria opening hours ? Are there set opening hours ? [MASK] ARI : It 's at 11 o'clock . [MASK] RC : Ah , it opens at 11 o'clock ? [MASK] ARI : Yes . [MASK] RC : And what time does it close ? [MASK] ARI : I 'm sorry , I do n't have this information . [MASK] RC : Ah , that 's a shame , thank you . [MASK] LP : Is there ... [MASK] ARI : Thank you . [MASK] LP : Is there a lift to get to the cafeteria ? [MASK] RC : Um no , because it 's on the ground floor . [MASK] LP : Oh ok. [MASK] RC : But could you please tell us where the lifts are ? Where at the entrance are they located ? [MASK] ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . [MASK] RC : Um for the lifts ? ARI : Yes . [MASK] [end] RC : You already told me this for the cafeteria . So the lifts and the cafeteria are right next to each other ? ARI : Absolutely . # affirm ( ) RC : Oh , okay , thank you very much . # thank ( ) ARI : Thank you . # thank ( ) ARI : See you around . Have a nice day . # bye ( )

src: LP : Hello ARI . # greet ( ) ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? # greet ( ) ; inform ( ari ( name ) ) ; offer-help ( ) [start] LP : Ask how ... [MASK] RC : Hello . I 'd like to have a small meal , can you tell me where we should go ? [MASK] ARI : There are a few options available as part of your visit , and there 's also a cafeteria on the ground floor . [MASK] RC : Can you tell me when the cafeteria opens ? [MASK] ARI : From 11 AM to 4 PM . [MASK] RC : From 11 AM to 4 PM , is that right ? [MASK] ARI : Yes , you 're right . [MASK] RC : Thank you . [MASK] ARI : You 're welcome , I 'm here to answer your questions . [MASK] RC : Is the cafeteria wheelchair accessible ? Because my friend is in a wheelchair and he ca n't get around by himself . [MASK] ARI : Yes , absolutely . [MASK] RC : Thank you . [MASK] LP : Hmm , ARI , could you tell me how to get to the cafeteria ? [MASK] ARI : There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . [MASK] RC : ARI , could you tell me if my appointment is at 11 AM ? [MASK] ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . You have to go to the reception . LP : He might know how to get there . LP : Can you tell me how to get to the reception ? [MASK] ARI : The reception is just behind me . Remember to take a ticket on your right . [MASK] RC : Ah , thank you . [MASK] LP : It 's quite simple . Thank you ARI . [MASK] ARI : You 're welcome . I 'm here to answer your questions . [MASK] LP : It would be nice if we knew how to take the lift . LP : ARI , could you tell us how to get to the lift ? [MASK] [end] ARI : The lifts are at the entrance on the left . # inform ( location ( lifts ) ) LP : Do these lifts take us to the cafeteria , or do we have to take something else ? ARI : I 'm sorry , but I ca n't help you . # cant-help ( ) RC : Is the cafeteria on the ground floor ? # request ( location ( cafe ) ) ARI : Yes , you 're right . # affirm ( ) RC : So we do n't have to take the lift to get to the cafeteria ? ARI : No , you do not . # disaffirm ( ) RC : Thank you . # thank ( ) LP : Thank you very much ARI . # thank ( ) ARI : You 're welcome , thank you , see you later and have a nice day . # thank ( ) ; bye ( )

src: RP : We 'll walk slowly , it 's ok . LC : Yes . # affirm ( ) [start] RP : Umm ... Where are the lifts ? [MASK] ARI : The lifts are at the entrance on the left . [MASK] RP : Ok. [MASK] [end] RP : We 'll take the lift then , it 'll be easier .
